summary: A visual social examination in the form of ten conversations between a driving woman and her various pick-ups and hitchhikers.
cast: Mania Akbari|Amin Maher|Kamran Adl|Roya Akbari|Roya Arabshahi|Amene Moradi|Mandana Sharbaf|Katayoun Taleizadeh
keywords: female driver|woman driver|conversation in car|conversation in a car|hitchhikers
title: Dah
